title: I'm GM and I don't have income certificate is it compulsory to submit during college admission after counseling??and it's 12 lakh and I did not submit that KCET application also it's showing my income zero
content:
And I don't have income certificate and my income is more than 12 lacs and I not submitted in during my kcet application process 

And in application it shows my income as zero is it a problem while getting admitted to the college 
Please help

comments.body: U don't need income certificate for GM category. Atleast it wasn't needed when I joined in 2021, pretty sure the same rules will be followed.
You get to change your stuff during final documentation.
